subject: Package Tracking
description_text: Hey Simsonn, I had ordered some Pedals through your website, but when they were ordered, I did not have an account. I entered in this email, "mseanleech@vt.edu" but never got a order confirmation. I don't know if it was a typo or a problem on your side. I later created an account with the said email and received the account t confirmation code emails just fine. I do have the bank statements saying the order went through, I ordered it July 14th with express shipping and would just like to track the package! Is there any way I can do that?Â

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael leech,    You didn't fill out an email address, I've added this current one for you, but can't resend you a shipping notification, you can track it through this link.  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=882782534426
